odysseus.common.entities

Class Bullpen

  • java.lang.Object
    • odysseus.common.entities.Bullpen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Bullpen
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Bullpen stores the pieces for a level. Only in the bullpen can a piece be rotated or flipped. The bullpen keeps a record of the pieces that it currently has for outside use.
    Author:
    Carlos Barcelos, Justin Myerson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getPiece

        public Piece getPiece(int x,
                      int y)
        A simple getter.
        Returns:
        a piece from the bullpen given its x,y position. The pieces are laid out 4 wide which is 4*7*Square.WIDTH.
